summary:
Letterbox effect originates from enbeffect.fx of \'hd6\', which is vignetting effect.

Jasmin ENB for the first time attempted and uploaded vignetting effect to the letterbox.

Letterbox is Jasmin\'s idea and thus please write a credit anyone who uploads and uses letterbox.

This is basic etiquette for who modify and upload ENB.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Jasmin ENB v5.5 Real Cinema




d3d9.dll file is not included upon the request of Borris, the developer of ENB

 
I was unaware of Borris\' request for several month during my game recess.


Follow the instructions below.




Instructions


1. First, go to http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm (ENB Site)


2. Please, Download ENB v0.119 


3. Overwrite ENB v0.199 files with Jastmin ENB v5.5. Or you just have to send d3d9.dll file to Jasmin folder.


4. Send ENB file to the folder where tesv.exe, the Skyrim execution file, is located.




Jasmin ENB v5.5 explanation


There are two folders when you unzip the file.

One is the main folder (Original ENB) and the other is Real Cinema Folder.

You can only apply one ENB and graphic is different.

(Refer to screenshots.)





Letterbox effect originates from enbeffect.fx of \'hd6\', which is vignetting effect.

Jasmin ENB for the first time attempted and uploaded vignetting effect to the letterbox.

Letterbox is Jasmin\'s idea and thus please write a credit anyone who uploads and uses letterbox.

This is basic etiquette for who modify and upload ENB.













credit 



 The develpoer of ENB, Boris Vorontsov : http://enbdev.com/ 



 HD6 (enbeffect.fx) : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142 



 Matso (enbeffectprepass.fx)  : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25451
author: r6angel
